summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.9°C) and outside temperature (down 2.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 801 m) and light levels (up 11904 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13893 lux), cloud levels (up 1498 m), feels like temperature (up 4.9°C), and outside temperature (up 3.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 800.5m lower than yesterday, 607.3m lower than the past week, 1497.5m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1185.9m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and weak sunlight because of clouds. Weather could become unsettled.
